copy.title: Snowflake Sweep
copy.tutorial_finalscore_label: I think you have the basics down now. Let's begin!
copy.host_bubble_3: Click the packets that have the same picture.
copy.host_bubble_4: Match both the picture and the number.
copy.host_bubble_5: The picture and the number must match.
copy.host_bubble_1B: Fly over a falling Snowflake to guide it to a pouch.
copy.host_bubble_2A: CLICK and DRAG with the mouse to sweep a Snowflake into a pouch.
copy.tutorial_stepIntro: Welcome to Blustery Brush. Let me show you how to collect Snowflakes for the mainland.
copy.tutorial_step1: The pouches show the color and number of the Snowflakes you need to collect. Fly over a falling Snowflake, then drag it into a pouch.
copy.tutorial_step5: You can catch more than one Snowflake at a time. Try not to let the Snowflakes touch before you get them in the pouch!
copy.tutorial_step7: Don't let the Snowflakes hit tree branches or icicle drops! Now, let's see if you can get 3 in the correct pouch.
copy.tutorial_step10: If time runs out, you will lose an attempt so watch this carefully!
copy.tutorial_step11: Here is where you can see how many attempts you have left. I will stay with you while you work, little one.
copy.easy_story: The Snowflakes are falling. Hurry now and catch them!
copy.medium_story: Pay attention to which Snowflakes goes in which pouch.
copy.hard_story: We need to collect all different kinds of Snowflakes. Stay alert!
copy.royal_story: It's becoming quite cold, so fly carefully. We have many pouches to fill!
copy.easy_exitstory: Well done, young one. But there are so many more pouches to fill. Keep flying!
copy.medium_exitstory: You handle the cold winds well, young one. You should be proud!
copy.hard_exitstory: Your help is greatly appreciated, young one. We now have enough Snowflakes for winter on the mainland!
copy.royal_exitstory: You have my thanks, young one. I've never seen anyone collect Snowflakes with such skill!
copy.allmedium_story: Marvelous, young one! Your skills are impressive. Now, let us continue.
copy.allhard_story: You have filled so many pouches! Thank you! But we are not done yet. Keep going!
copy.allroyal_story: Winter on the mainland is very near! We must fill all the pouches.
copy.welcome_text: Welcome to Blustery Brush. As the Minister of Winter, it is my responsibility to ensure that Snowflakes are gathered and taken to the mainland each winter. Can you assist me? The Snowflake-talents will create a flurry for you. Perhaps you can use the wind to sweep the Snowflakes into the correct pouches.
copy.game_over_win_0: I am so very pleased. Excellent work.
copy.game_over_win_1: I admire your abilities. I welcome your aid at any time.
copy.game_over_win_2: A grand achievement, young one. Well done.
copy.game_over_win_3: My thanks, young one. Your aid is most appreciated.
copy.game_over_lose_time_0: I admire your efforts. I hope you come back to try again.
copy.game_over_lose_time_1: Do not be disappointed, my friend. Your efforts are appreciated, and you may always try again.
copy.game_over_lose_time_2: You did your best, my friend. I hope you come back to try again.
copy.clock_alert_0: Be careful! Don't run out of time!
copy.destroy_by_drop_0: Your Snowflake hit a water drop.
copy.destroy_by_branche_1: The Snowflake melted on a branch.
copy.destroy_by_basket_0: This Snowflake doesn't go in that pouch.
copy.destroy_by_basket_1: Snowflakes fall from pouches if the wrong color is added.
copy.destroy_by_fairy_0: I'm afraid Snowflakes melt if they touch you.
copy.destroy_by_fairy_1: Try to not touch the Snowflakes, please.
copy.basket_1: You filled the pouch. Well done.
copy.basket_2: Very good, you filled the pouch!
copy.bonus_1: Very nice! You won a bonus!
copy.life_0: Good Job! You got the Perfect Bonus!!
copy.life_1: Well done! This level was perfect!
copy.instruction0: Drag your mouse to move the wind and guide the Snowflakes to the correct pouches.
copy.instruction1: The Snowflakes are different colors! Make sure you match the color of the Snowflake to the color on the pouch. If you fill all the pouches without putting the wrong color into any you will get a PERFECT score.
copy.instruction2: You can thread more than one Snowflake on a current of wind, but don't let them touch you before going into a pouch or they will melt.
copy.instruction3: Don't let your Snowflakes run into tree branches or icicle drops.
copy.instruction4: Make sure you collect all the multi-colored Snowflakes. They can be used to fill a pouch with any color! Also, use the glowing Snowflakes to fill your pouches faster.
copy.level_tip_2: Catch 3 of these Snowflakes and put them in the pouch!
copy.level_tip_3: Watch now -- there are 3 different colors of Snowflakes falling. Place 5 of the correct color in the pouch, would you?
copy.level_tip_4: Fly carefully! You're doing a great job!
copy.level_tip_5: Now you will need to fill 2 pouches.
copy.level_tip_6: Use the multi-color Snowflakes whenever you can. They will help to fill any pouch.
copy.level_tip_7: Fill the pouches with 7 Snowflakes. Fly swiftly, for all the Snowflakes are falling faster now.
copy.level_tip_8: Now we need to catch 8 Snowflakes in each pouch! Be careful!
copy.level_tip_9: These pouches are harder to reach and now we need to catch 9 Snowflakes in each! Fly carefully.
copy.level_tip_10: You have 3 pouches to fill with 6 Snowflakes each. Be quick, my friend.
copy.level_tip_11: There are only 2 pouches, but they need 9 Snowflakes each! Look for the hourglass to gain time.
copy.level_tip_12: Be sure to watch how many Snowflakes you need to fill each pouch!
copy.level_tip_13: Use the glowing Snowflakes if you can.
copy.level_tip_15: Avoid the icicles. The drops will melt the Snowflakes.
copy.level_tip_16: Fly carefully! You're doing a great job!
copy.level_tip_17: Use the special Snowflakes whenever you can. It will transform all the Snowflakes on the screen into wildcards.
copy.level_tip_18: Look out! There are 2 icicles dripping now!
copy.level_tip_19: Fly carefully! You're doing a great job!
copy.level_tip_20: Fly carefully. You must fill 3 pouches now.
copy.level_tip_21: Fly carefully! You're doing a great job!
copy.level_tip_22: The Snowflakes are falling faster, so fly with haste.
copy.level_tip_23: Watch your pouches to see how many Snowflakes need to be collected.
copy.level_tip_24: Fly with care. These pouches are difficult to reach.
copy.level_tip_25: I fear the wind is picking up.
copy.level_tip_26: Fly carefully! You're doing a great job!
copy.level_tip_28: Fly faster, my friend. The Snowflakes are falling more quickly now and you must collect 10 per pouch.
copy.level_tip_29: There are many icicles -- avoid them at all costs.
copy.level_tip_30: There are many Snowflakes and the wind is blowing hard. These are the last pouches you must fill. I believe in you!
copy.loose_a_life_0: Time is up, I'm afraid. Please try again!
copy.host_level_1_2: Do you see how you can move the wind currents?
copy.host_level_2_0: Very good. Try to capture more.
copy.host_level_2_1: The Snowflake's color must match the one on the pouch.
copy.host_level_3_0: Keep your eyes alert, my friend.
copy.host_level_4_0: Fly as quickly as you can.
copy.host_level_5_0: I'm sure you can fill all the pouches.
copy.host_level_6_0: That is a beautiful Snowflake, isn't it?
copy.host_level_7_0: Ah, here come more colors of Snowflakes.
copy.host_level_8_0: There is nothing as lovely as falling snow.
I'm depending on you, little one.
copy.host_level_9_0: Catch as many Snowflakes as you can.
copy.host_level_10_0: Take care, the wind is picking up.
copy.host_level_10_1: You have quite the talent for this, my friend.
copy.host_level_12_0: There are even more pouches to fill now.
copy.host_level_12_1: These Winter Woods have lovely Snowflakes.
copy.host_level_13_0: Be sure not to run short of time.
copy.host_level_14_0: I'm quite impressed with you so far.
copy.host_level_15_0: Be sure to avoid the icicle drops.
copy.host_level_16_0: Dodge the icicle drops, little one.
copy.host_level_16_1: Oh, I'm sure you can fly faster than that.
copy.host_level_17_0: There's no time to rest, not yet.
copy.host_level_17_1: Be sure not to run short of time.
copy.host_level_18_0: There are more icicles now. Stay alert.
copy.host_level_18_1: Remember, you create wind as you fly.
copy.host_level_19_0: You are quite good at this, my friend.
copy.host_level_19_1: I know you can fly faster if you try.
copy.host_level_21_0: You're such a good helper. Thank you.
copy.host_level_22_0: I see a different Snowflake falling.
copy.host_level_23_0: I am so impressed by your efforts.
copy.host_level_24_2: I hope you are not too cold.
copy.host_level_25_0: The wind is blowing the Snowflakes harder.
copy.host_level_26_0: You must fly faster than ever now.
copy.host_level_26_2: Next winter on the mainland will be beautiful.
copy.host_level_27_0: Don't bump into the tree branches.
copy.host_level_27_2: I see Snowflake sparkles in your eyes.
copy.host_level_28_0: I appreciate how hard you're working.
copy.host_level_28_1: Blustery Brush is a lovely place, isn't it?
copy.host_level_28_2: Winter is cold, but it warms my heart.
copy.host_level_29_2: You are most kind to help me today.
copy.host_level_30_0: Don't let the winds slow you down.
copy.host_level_30_2: You are doing me a great favor.
